tool_description: Configures and prepares the calibration setup including instrument mounting, reference positioning, and system initialization for dimensional measurement calibration.

instrument_id.description: Unique identifier for the instrument to be calibrated

reference_standard.description: Primary reference standard to be used

automation_enabled.description: Whether to use automated measurement system

error_messages: Invalid measurement range: minimum must be less than maximum, and range must be positive.
Unsupported mounting type: Use one of [horizontal, vertical, angle_plate, universal_stand].
Resolution incompatible: Specified resolution exceeds instrument capabilities.
Reference standard unavailable: The specified reference standard is not accessible.
Setup configuration error: Current configuration is incompatible with instrument specifications.
Insufficient warmup time: Warmup time must be at least 15 minutes for stable measurements.
usage: Configure measurement parameters, mounting, and reference standards. Allow specified warmup time before beginning calibration measurements. Verify all connections and alignments.

thermal_stability.description: Whether thermal equilibrium has been reached

ready_for_calibration.description: Whether setup is ready for calibration measurements

estimated_uncertainty.description: Initial estimated measurement uncertainty in micrometers
